senses.sense_definition: Resembling or characteristic of the <w>Eskimo</w> people.

examples.text: The ancient carving had a distinct <w>Eskimoid</w> style, suggesting contact with northern tribes.
Early researchers described the facial features of the population as <w>Eskimoid</w>.

traits.comment: modern usage typically prefers specific terms like Inuit or Yupik

senses.sense_definition: An individual or artifact exhibiting characteristics resembling those of the <w>Eskimo</w> people.

examples.text: The museum curator classified the tool as an <w>Eskimoid</w> found in the sub-arctic region.
In older texts, certain cultural groups were sometimes categorized as <w>Eskimoids</w> based on their tools and lifestyle.
